articles.author: Patrick Andres
articles.title: USA Rugby Gets Huge Donation From Businesswoman Michele Kang After Bronze Medal Win - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Americans surprised Australia Tuesday in the Olympic women's third-place match.
articles.content:
On Tuesday, the United States women's rugby sevens team won twice.
Firstand foremostthe squad won its first Olympic medal against Australia, downing the traditional rugby power 1412 to win bronze th… [+772 chars]
